original: WHEREAS, Shipper has requested Transporter to transport Gas on its behalf and Transporter represents that it is willing to transport Gas under the terms and conditions of this Agreement.
ollama_generated: WHEREAS, Upon request from Shipper for the transportation of Gas, Transporter voluntarily consents to undertake such transportation, as set forth in the provisions of this Agreement. The onus lies with Transporter to ensure compliance with these terms and conditions.

10. POINTS OF DISPATCH AND ACCEPTANCE:

The Seller shall dispatch the Goods from their premises, and the Buyer shall accept delivery at the agreed location, which shall be mutually determined in advance. Failure by either party to perform this obligation may result in a delay or termination of the Contract, depending on the circumstances and the agreement between the parties.

original: This Agreement shall incorporate and in all respects be subject to the "General Terms and Conditions" and the applicable Rate Schedule (as stated above) set forth in Transporter's FERC Gas Tariff, Third Revised Volume No. 1, as may be revised from time to time. Transporter may file and seek Commission approval under Section 4 of the Natural Gas Act (NGA) at any time and from time to time to change any rates, charges or provisions set forth in the applicable Rate Schedule (as stated above) and the "General Terms and Conditions" in Transporter's FERC Gas Tariff, Third Revised Volume No. 1, and Transporter shall have the right to place such changes in effect in accordance with the NGA, and this Agreement shall be deemed to include such changes and any such changes Source: TC PIPELINES LP, 10-K, 2/26/2016 which become effective by operation of law and Commission Order, without prejudice to Shipper's right to protest the same.
ollama_generated: This Agreement shall adhere to and be governed entirely by the "General Terms and Conditions" and the applicable Rate Schedule (as specified previously) outlined in Transporter's FERC Gas Tariff, Third Revised Volume No. 1, as amended or updated at Transporter's discretion. Shipper acknowledges that Transporter reserves the authority, without notice to Shipper, to modify or update any rates, charges, or provisions within the aforementioned documents in accordance with Section 4 of the Natural Gas Act (NGA). Any such modifications or updates shall take effect immediately upon operation of law and Commission Order, and this Agreement shall automatically incorporate such changes. Shipper understands that they do not have the right to protest these alterations but acknowledges their continued obligation under this Agreement.

13. MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS:

In the event of any discrepancy or ambiguity in this Agreement, the party claiming such discrepancy or ambiguity shall bear the burden of resolving it amicably and expeditiously with the other party. If a resolution cannot be reached, the matter shall be submitted to mediation, and if mediation fails, then and only then shall either party institute arbitration proceedings or seek judicial resolution, at their sole discretion.

original: Upon termination of this Agreement, Shipper's and Transporter's obligations to each other arising under this Agreement, prior to the date of termination, remain in effect and are not being terminated by any provision of this Agreement.
ollama_generated: Upon the termination of this Agreement, neither Shipper nor Transporter will be relieved from their respective obligations, as outlined within this Agreement, that arose prior to the effective date of termination, unless expressly provided otherwise in this Agreement.

ASSUMED OBLIGATIONS BY:

The obligations assumed in this agreement by the parties shall be interpreted as those for which each party will make a good faith effort to fulfill, recognizing that certain administrative matters may not always be completely under their control. Should unforeseen circumstances arise that impede the performance of these duties, prompt and open communication between the parties is essential to resolve any challenges that may arise.
